page.title: 06Farm Machinery.
page.content: Mr. Kynastons machinery is quite up to date. He tries to keep it as modern as he can so that he can collect and store his cattle more efficient. He keeps five tractors,four Massey Fergusons and one David Brown. He has one Massey Ferguson combine harvester. A small engined tractor, costs around Â£10,000. But a tractor with a big engine and four wheel drive costs Â£18,000 or even more. The milking parlour is also modern and efficient. They have a special feeding system to give the cows exactly the right amount of food. If they are lactating they get more food so they will produce more milk.
